title: The Ghost Reckoning
outcome: A cache of BCI audit logs and coded diary pages emerges, revealing that Halden rigged the 'Redemption Games' to expose past abuses—especially forced disappearances. As BCI records of vanished citizens return as inactive profiles, communities split: some demand justice and the end of BCI, others want control and reform. Council factions are dragged into public inquiries, and grassroots truth commissions put the Council and old system on trial. As the unrest boils, citizens must collectively choose: abolish the BCI or attempt a public, transparent reset.

events.description: Anonymous BCI audit logs and coded diary pages detailing forced disappearances are posted publicly across districts. Communities react with outrage and fear, organizing urgent town meetings.
Deactivated 'ghost profiles' of vanished citizens emerge within BCI. Neighborhoods form truth commissions demanding answers from Council factions regarding disappearances.
Mass protests and assemblies erupt at Council offices as families of the disappeared speak out. The Council is forced into public hearings on historical BCI abuses.
A citywide referendum is called, giving citizens two clear options: eradicate the BCI entirely, or completely reset it with permanent public oversight. The result will transform the city’s future.
